references.paper_title: Embodied hands: modeling and capturing hands and bodies together
references.reason: This paper introduces the Embodied Hands model, a foundational parametric hand model used extensively in the field for 3D hand reconstruction and animation, directly influencing the proposed method's hand representation.

references.paper_title: HTML: A parametric hand texture model for 3D hand reconstruction and personalization
references.reason: This paper presents the High-fidelity Hand Texture Model (HTML), a significant contribution to hand texture modeling that is directly relevant to the proposed method's approach to creating high-fidelity hand textures.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), a groundbreaking technique in novel-view synthesis that has significantly impacted the field of 3D reconstruction and is directly relevant to the Gaussian Splatting approach employed in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, a core technique used in the proposed method for efficient and high-quality 3D rendering, directly shaping its technical approach.

references.paper_title: Ohta: One-shot hand avatar via data-driven implicit priors
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it tackles a similar problem—one-shot hand avatar creation—and shares some technical similarities, making it a strong comparative baseline for the proposed method.
